content.html: We’ve been seeing issues in the app for a day or two now with replies suddenly reordering or tweets disappearing or showing as unavailable after being posted, despite still being available elsewhere. This is surely the fault of everyone who was fired & not anyone named Elon Musk
content.value:
We’ve been seeing issues in the app for a day or two now with replies suddenly reordering or tweets disappearing or showing as unavailable after being posted, despite still being available elsewhere.

This is surely the fault of everyone who was fired & not anyone named Elon Musk
